record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:07 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, January 11, 2007, at 9:30 a.m.
